meanings.definition: Causing damage to the ear or hearing
meanings.sent1: The loud music from the concert was ototoxic to my ears.
meanings.sent2: Doctors warn that certain medications can be ototoxic and affect your hearing.
meanings.sent3: I told the noisy birds to stop their ototoxic chirping near my window!
meanings.sent4: The constant exposure to construction noise was ototoxic, slowly eroding my ability to hear clearly.
meanings.sent5: The screeching sound of the microphone was so ototoxic that it made everyone cover their ears.

meanings.definition: A substance that can harm the auditory system
meanings.sent1: She avoided using any ototoxic substances near her ears.
meanings.sent2: The researchers studied the effects of different ototoxic chemicals on hearing loss.
meanings.sent3: The villain in the movie used an ototoxic potion to make people temporarily deaf!
meanings.sent4: The rumors spread about a secret formula that was an ototoxic nightmare for the ears.
meanings.sent5: The lab technician handled the ototoxic solution with extreme caution to protect his hearing.
